      • getType

        RequirementType getType()
        The nature of the requirement. From RC2119.
        Returns:
        the requirement type

      • isConditional

        boolean isConditional()
        Indicates if the requirement nature is conditional. For example: If A, B MUST be true. Or: B MUST be true, if A
        Returns:
        true if the requirement is conditional, or false otherwise

      • getMessageText

        String getMessageText(String... args)
        The message to display when this requirement is triggered (e.g., by error, warning, or informational condition).
        Parameters:
        args - contextual arguments used to format the message
        Returns:
        an internationalized, formatted message
